definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Liu
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
surname Dao
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
Liu Xiang (1983-), Chinese gold-medal hurdler of the 2004 Olympic Games
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
bangs/fringe (hair)
Liu Bei (161-223), warlord at the end of the Han dynasty and founder of the Han kingdom of Shu 蜀漢|蜀汉 (c. 200-263), later the Shu Han dynasty
Liu Shaoqi (1898-1969), Chinese communist leader, a martyr of the Cultural Revolution
Liu Yang (1978-), China's first female astronaut in space (June 16, 2012)
Liu Xinwu (1942-), novelist
Liu Bang (256 or 247-195 BC), bandit leader who became first Han emperor Han Gaozu 漢高祖|汉高祖 (reigned 202-195 BC)
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)
Lau Ching-Wan (1964-), Hong Kong actor
Liu Jinbao
Liu Xiang (77-6 BC), Han Dynasty scholar and author
Liu Heng, personal name of Han emperor Han Wendi 漢文帝|汉文帝/Liu Heng (1954-), Chinese writer

sentences.english: Meng shu and liu to fisticuffs, as a result, liu pain beat.
sentences.chinese: 爲此孟蜀和劉地大打出手，結果劉地被痛揍一頓。

sentences.english: My name is Liujunjie. She is Heyi. We are good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我是何怡，他是我的好朋友劉俊傑。

sentences.english: LiuJianGong etc people get shangguan form mining tunnel after the information.
sentences.chinese: 劉建功等人得到上官于飛挖掘地道的信息之後。

sentences.english: Doctor Liu is on call at all times.
sentences.chinese: 不論什麼時候劉醫生隨叫隨到。

sentences.english: They told that Professor Liu would have been teaching here for twenty years by this winter.
sentences.chinese: 他們說到今年冬天時劉教授在這裏教書要滿二十年了。

sentences.english: Our general manager, Mr. Liu's idea is the best.
sentences.chinese: 我們劉總經理提出的設想最好。

sentences.english: Residents Liu used cell phone cameras to the video of the construction site at night.
sentences.chinese: 居民劉軍用手機拍攝到了工地夜間施工的視頻。

sentences.english: Xu felt that she had tied Liu down and repeatedly asked him, 'Are you regretful?
sentences.chinese: 徐認爲，她綁住劉下來，反覆問他，你是否有後悔？

sentences.english: Lord Mandelson extended warm welcome to Ambassador Liu for assuming his new post in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 曼德爾森勳爵熱烈歡迎劉大使來英履新。

sentences.english: Professor Lawrence J. Lau was installed as the sixth Vice-Chancellor of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 劉遵義教授就任香港中文大學第六任校長。

sentences.english: Flight LiuChangLing fell in love with QingBaoChu mid-team leader of the MaXin blue captain.
sentences.chinese: 飛行中隊長劉長嶺愛上了情報處的馬昕藍上尉。

sentences.english: The paper is a preliminary study of Liu Yingzhou who was a main representative of Jiangjing gang, Liu began his business at the age of 20.
sentences.chinese: 本文對江津幫的主要代表人物劉瀛洲做了初步的研究。

sentences.english: Xiao Feng asked for leave the day before yesterday, Coach Liu called at his home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 小馮前天請假了，昨天劉教練到他家看過他。

sentences.english: Liu said one of her favorite English mottos is "No one can achieve anything without effort".
sentences.chinese: 劉表示她最喜歡的英語格言是“沒有人能不勞而獲。”

sentences.english: Liu Guoxi was named as a drug kingpin in the Far Eastern Economic Review during the mid 90's.
sentences.chinese: 90年代中期，劉國璽曾被遠東經濟評論認定爲毒梟。

sentences.english: Liu Chunlei errs for many times be punished.
